Name: Burgers
About the game: Experience the story of a small group of German soldiers sent to a small town to investigate strange activities. The task was supposed to be fast and easy. Instead, they would face the Unimaginable Find out how they had to fail their country to save the world Inspired by Contra, Metal Slug, Castle Crashers and all of those good old coop games +Level up. Unlock new characters. Earn points. Purchase Weapons. Show off what you have +Enter the Arena. Test your skill against challenging Fights +Customize spawns for your own Arena +Be a lone Hero or team up with friends and start having fun blasting
